result.title: Welcome
result.content:
I wish to welcome you all! We are 19 at the moment. As we all committed to work hard we should share our methods of solving a problem and our streghts and weaknesses.

I got some ideas that might be useful , but I want to know your opinion about them:

  1. Write what mistakes we made during the problem solving process
  2. Share our weaknesses , so that others can give some problems to solve or theory on different areas ( like DP , greedy , graphs , etc)
  3. Make virtual contests of the same round
  4. Make a list of problems that we couldn't solve , so we can try them together
  5. Make standings on a Google Spreadsheet to track our evolution

I am waiting for your feedback. :D
